items.sentence: Firefighters are some of the most courageous people in the world.
A teacher should never make fun of a student who makes a mistake.
Two adult tickets and three children's tickets to London, please.
When I was three years old, my name was changed from Tom to John.
The dog started wagging its tail as soon as Tom entered the room.
That movie wasn't as interesting as I thought it was going to be.
Tom told me that he thought Mary still wanted to go to Australia.
Tom told me he thought that Mary still wanted to go to Australia.
I'm convinced that Tom can speak French well enough to work here.
I don't think that I should tell Tom that I'm going to Australia.
